name: Four Points By Sheraton Bangkok, Sukhumvit 15

reviews.text: This is nice quality hotel for a good value. The location is very close to the BTS. The rooms are nice size with a large bathroom. The breakfast buffet has a nice selection of food... especially for this level of a hotel. I suggest this hotel to anyone coming to Bangkok that is on a budget but wants to stay at a Starwood property. While it is not an upmarket 5 star hotel it is a great value for it's class of service.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel... Good location, good value and quality

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have been to Thailand and Bangkok several times a year. This time we chose Four Points because of the hotel promotion. It's around 2800B per night with 2 breakfast include tax.
reviews.title: Four Points by Sheraton - Good choice with attractive rate

reviews.text: Pros:
reviews.title: 'Four Points by Sheraton - excellent choice'

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: ^^ Large variety for breakfast (I would say yummy and pretty good)
reviews.title: Nice hotel

reviews.text: ^^ Comfortable bed and pillows
reviews.title: Excellent stay... nice location, walking distance to Nana-skytrain station

reviews.text: New fresh on a quite soi just of sukhomvit. Light relaxed unpretentious friendly young team....perfect. Good food....nice bar with speciality beers. Minutes from the sky train huge malls and the infamous night life hot spots of bkk.
reviews.title: A gem in the heart of the jungle

reviews.text: Hotel is very clean and location is good also, you are between the NANA and ASOKE train stations. Staff is very helpful and goes the extra mile when needed. The rooms are very clean and modern. Would highly recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Good location, excellent staff

reviews.text: Its always nice to be remembered when by the front office staff when I return here, this has now become my regular residence in Bangkok. The junior suites suites are a perfect size for a few nights or even just one. As always the staff and management are as friendly as ever and what I like most is that they always have something going on in this hotel. There's a happy hour in the Beer Vault, there's cocktail tasking on the roof top Amber bar, different nights have different events. Top marks to the F&B manager. Even if your not resident in this hotel it's worth a visit.
reviews.title: Always a great stay at the 4 Points Bangkok

reviews.text: Highly recommended.
reviews.title: Value for Money A+++

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed for over a week at this great hotel tucked away on a side street. Dont get fooled by its modest outward apppaerance. It happens to be an excellent choice with a lavish lobby, courteous and friendly staff, a must for breakfast with fresh fruits and fruit juices, well worth every penny, free internet in lobby, meticulously maintained rooms and facilities.
reviews.title: Outstanding value without any compromises

reviews.text: I stayed in four points by Sheraton for 6 nights. We got a deluxe room with 2 queen beds. Room is big and beds are comfortable! A four star hotel with 5 star service. Why? I have stayed in 5 star hotels before but none of the staff in those hotels had left any impression in me. Here, the staff are extremely friendly and helpful. Really appreciate the excellent service offered by Meaw and Harry! Thanks Meaw for being attentive towards our needs when we checked in. Thanks Harry for always smiling and ready to render your assistance all the time.
reviews.title: Exceedingexpectation!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location is fantastic! The hotel is about 5 min walk (with kids) to the shopping mall, Terminal 21 and Asoke Station. Being Muslims, we eat Halal food. It was about 10 min walk to soi 3 to enjoy a variety of halal spread.
reviews.title: perfect!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My family and I really love this place and this is our first but certainly not last visit! See u again four point by Sheraton Bangkok!!! Keep up the wonderful service, cleanliness and standard!
reviews.title: Value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I think it would be fantabulous if the wifi in the room is free. :) hope it is the next time I'm there! :):)
reviews.title: good central location

reviews.text: 1) Great location - 5 minute walk to the BTS (Asok) and MRT (Sukhumvit) stations, which are in the center of Bangkok. Near Sukhumvit soi 11, one of Bangkok's party scenes. Has two malls nearby: Robinson (where there's a Tops supermarket at the basement) and Terminal 21 (which is a really nice mall!).
reviews.title: One of the BEST HOTEL i ever stayed..

reviews.text: This is a really best value of money hotel If you are planning to do some shopping and sightseeing in Bangkok, Rooms are excellent, Breakfast is excellent as well, The location is very good walking distance from both Nana and Asoke Sky train stations which would directly take you to malls, week end market and the peire station which you could visit the rand palace through taking a boat from there. Staff are very friendly and very polite, The only drawback is the street, When you walk out of the hotel you don't feel you're coming out from a luxury hotel but except for that I think its very very good.
reviews.title: All you need from a hotel during city visits

reviews.text: This is the third hotel where I've stayed during recent trips to the Sukhumvit area and I couldn't be happier. It's tucked away among the larger accommodations in the area and I consider it a hidden gem.
reviews.title: Refreshing Boutique Hotel in Sukhumvit

reviews.text: The entire staff was very accomodating the entire time I was there. Service was very prompt and courteous; they were always asking if there was anything else they could do for me! Although it's a smaller footprint compared to the larger hotels in the area, the overall feel of the property didn't reflect this. I attribute this to the modern design theme which makes efficient use of all space.
reviews.title: Four Points - BKK - average

reviews.text: Breakfast buffet was typical Asian influence, fast service, fresh food, and plenty of portions.
reviews.title: Interesting place to be

reviews.text: Three areas stand out: late check out option, very comfortable bed, and quiet at night (couldn't hear any of the busy night life nearby). These qualities are very important to me as a business traveler and I won't go anywhere else when I find myself returning to this area of Bangkok.
reviews.title: A brilliant hotel made even more special by the fantastic hands on GM!!
